summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in block 18, Law's Addition, being the alley between 16th Avenue North and 17th Avenue North, from East Republican Street to East Harrison Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 95415 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
